TopicTitle: Looking for a Mod that allows submersibles

Articles.Content:
Hello. 

I'm looking for a mod, that adds parts or a plugin that would **allow for submersibles**. I've looked around and can't seem to find any that are updated. I've already looked at hooligan labs and the submarine add-on says it's broken and there is no download link.

Also would be interested in a **camera mod that allows you to look around while underwater**, currently the camera gets locked when you dive below the surface.

I'm currently using BetterBuoyancy for better water physics.

Yes i have, and it's perfect for some of my light patrol ship designs, but the bitts (Which hold 5 tons of water to make you sink down) aren't enough to make me go down no matter how many i use and fill.

There's a bathysphere part in the Maritime Pack that does submerse - probably not what you're after but you might be able look at the cfg and roll your own. That still leaves the camera stuck at the surface problem...
